description:
Το myHealth είναι μια σύγχρονη εφαρμογή που αποτελεί μέρος του Εθνικού Ηλεκτρονικού Φακέλου Υγείας και προσφέρει ηλεκτρονική εξυπηρέτηση στους πολίτες για θέματα υγείας και ιατρικών πράξεων.

Με το myHealth, οι πολίτες έχουν εύκολη και άμεση πρόσβαση:
    - Στις συνταγές φαρμάκων και τα παραπεμπτικά διαγνωστικών εξετάσεων τους.
    - Στις Ηλεκτρονικές Ιατρικές Βεβαιώσεις που εκδίδουν οι ιατροί τους.
    - Στα ιστορικά δεδομένα του φακέλου ασθενή, συμπεριλαμβανομένων διαγνώσεων, βεβαιώσεων, εμβολιασμών, αποτελεσμάτων εξετάσεων, αλλεργιών και δυσανεξιών.
    - Στη νέα λειτουργικότητα δέσμευσης ραντεβού, για ευκολότερο προγραμματισμό επισκέψεων σε επαγγελματίες υγείας.
    - Στο ιστορικό πρόσβασης του φακέλου υγείας, ώστε οι πολίτες να γνωρίζουν ποιοι γιατροί έχουν δει τα ιατρικά τους δεδομένα.
    - Σταδιακά, θα είναι διαθέσιμα όλα τα δεδομένα που έχουν καταχωριστεί στο Σύστημα Ηλεκτρονικής Συνταγογράφησης.

Κατεβάστε το myHealth και αποκτήστε τον έλεγχο του ιατρικού σας ιστορικού, γρήγορα και εύκολα!

Doctoranytime is a helpful companion, attuned to your health needs. You can easily find the most suitable professional, among more than 100 specialties, and instantly book an appointment for you or your loved ones. Choose between a Visit or a Video Consultation, from the comfort of your home.

Easily pick your preferred location and book an appointment on a date and time that fits your schedule. Keep track of your health with an easy-to-use app, in a totally secure environment. 

4 reasons to choose doctoranytime as your trusted health companion:
• Easily find and book the best professional for your needs
• Select from more than 100 specialties and numerous services to personalize your experience
• Book a Visit or a Video Consultation from the comfort of your home
• Join a vast community of users that provide valuable feedback for every professional

The list of professionals is endless, you’re sure to find what you’re looking for and more!

Download doctoranytime app for free and keep your health in check!

We’re here for you anytime!

[:mav: 2.0.10]

Full Code is an intuitive, mobile-first simulation designed by medical experts for individuals who want to become better medical professionals, including medical students, residents, physicians, nurses, NPs, PAs, EMTs, paramedics, and more.

The platform offers over 230+ realistic virtual cases and an engaging, game-like interface. You can choose from hundreds of possible actions as you diagnose and treat acutely sick patients in this open-ended medical simulation.

Daily, deliberate practice is the key to maintaining and improving your clinical skills. Download and play a free case today!

Interested in bringing Full Code to your organization or institution? Learn more at fullcodemedical.com!

Features:
• 230+ case library written and peer-reviewed by expert clinicians
• Over 30 diagnostic disciplines, including Emergency Medicine, OBGYN, and Pediatrics
• 25+ realistic avatars, including pediatric and adult patients
• *NEW* EMS cases and ambulance environment
• Detailed scoring and full case breakdowns - learn your strengths and weaknesses
• Patient AI enables practice with history taking
• Full Code Pro + CME provides 100+ hours of accredited CME
• Frequent new cases and regular updates

TRAIN ON YOUR TERMS
Full Code’s on-demand simulation training with realistic virtual patients allows you to practice complex cases and enhance your skills whenever you get a break, wherever you happen to be, on the devices you already own.

IMPROVE YOUR CONFIDENCE
Full Code's infinitely repeatable cases measure skills in both diagnosis and management, allowing you to learn from your mistakes in a risk-free environment. Build competence so you can face complex real-world cases with confidence.

PRACTICE MAKES THE PRACTITIONER
Frequent, deliberate practice is the key to clinical success and improving your clinical decision-making ability. Full Code can easily fit into any schedule—whether you're a med student or practicing clinician.

NEW CHALLENGES 
Every case presents a new challenge in Full Code: from routine diagnosis to rare diseases. You’re not just limited to the hospital, either—Full Code has expanded into pre-hospital and EMS content. Get out of the ED and into the ambulance for all new scenarios!

LEARN FROM TOP MEDICAL EXPERTS
Created by medical educators from some of the top hospitals in the U.S. and peer-reviewed by licensed medical professionals, our simulations are designed with industry-standard medical best practices, setting the bar high for medical students and professionals worldwide. 

EARN CME CREDIT
Complete your continuing medical education (CME) requirements with flexible and engaging simulation challenges accredited through the Accreditation Council for Continuing Medical Education (ACCME). With our PRO+CME subscription, you can earn up to 100 CME credits. Subscribe to Full Code Pro+CME to get started.


FEATURED APP STORE REVIEWS

Fun and Educational
“I’m in nursing school and my partner is in medical school. We play for fun and it teaches a lot, certainly makes you think more and how not to order everything under the sun. Highly recommend!”
—Kirsten9008

Exactly what EM needed
“Happened to stumble upon the app when I was looking for virtual EM sim learning. It’s exactly what I was looking for. It’s well developed and thought out with pertinent information. Thank you!”
— ariamour

Worth every penny!
“For those looking for a simple but entertaining way to study and prepare for clerkships, think through cases in residency, or even prepare for your oral boards, I think Full Code is the learning tool for you…Thank you, Full Code, for being a long-time study partner! Looking forward to your continued dedication to medical education!”
— Hartridge


FOLLOW FULL CODE

Facebook: facebook.com/fullcodemedical
Twitter: @fullcodemedical
Instagram: @fullcodemedical
TikTok: @fullcodemedical
Website: fullcodemedical.com
Play on desktop: app.fullcodemedical.com

Clinical Decision Support for Healthcare Professionals (NPI Required).

OpenEvidence is the world’s leading medical information platform for health care professionals, providing accurate and efficient answers at the point of care. Every answer on OpenEvidence is always sourced, cited, and grounded in the peer-reviewed medical literature.

Now featuring New England Journal of Medicine (NEJM) published content, NEJM multimedia content, and NEJM invited review articles authored by the world’s leading clinical experts.

• 160 medical specialties
• 1,000+ diseases and therapeutic areas
• 1m+ medical topics

Trusted by medical professionals at 10,000+ care centers across the United States.

OpenEvidence is only available for health care professionals. Users must verify their health care professional status before using OpenEvidence.

AS SEEN IN

Forbes: “OpenEvidence Keeps Doctors Up To Date On The Latest Science”

TESTIMONIALS

“I've been using OpenEvidence for the last week - it has been amazing! Able to narrow down on results quickly and find information that I wasn't able to do with Google/PubMed searches on my own.” - Dr. John Lee, MD. Physician & Faculty Member, Harvard Medical School

“OpenEvidence can be the foundational technology to power all clinical decision tools.” - Dr. Antonio Jorge Forte, MD. Director of MayoExpert, Mayo Clinic

“OpenEvidence is more up-to-date than UpToDate. And more useful regardless, since it’s interactive, and you can ask it questions, and get very specific answers about specific medical fact patterns in a patient case. It’s like having a curbside consult with a team of expert physicians, but that you can carry around with you in your pocket.” - Dr. Ram Dandillaya, MD. Clinical Chief, Department of Cardiology, Cedars-Sinai Medical Center

“I am in community practice and medical director of a community cancer center. OpenEvidence has been an incredible lifeline for daily practitioners.” - C.J., Oncologist 

“OpenEvidence is absolutely fantastic. I use it a gazillion times a day.” - J.A., Neurologist

“OpenEvidence’s efforts to make medicine more evidence-based are invaluable. The shift from judgment to calculation can reduce the level of noise currently found in medicine.” - Daniel Kahneman, Nobel Prize Laureate (In Memoriam)

“It is light years ahead of the next best medical oriented AI I have used.” - R.E.., Oncologist

STAY SHARP & UP-TO-DATE

• Find what you need, when you need it on a mobile-native platform.

• The world’s most powerful medical search engine at your fingertips.

• Discover and find exactly what you are looking for with deep search and a highly intuitive user interface that understands you and what you are asking.

developer: Federation Internationale des Societes de la Croix-Rouge et du Croissant Rouge
description:
Simple. Free. It can save lives. 

The official IFRC First Aid app gives instant access to the information you need to know to handle the most common first aid emergencies and safety tips for crisis situation. With interactive quizzes and simple step-by-step everyday first aid scenarios, it’s never been easier to learn first aid. 
 
 ■ Engaging and active learning, allowing you to see and track your progress, build your knowledge, and increase confidence in your skills and ability to assist in emergencies.
 ■ Safety tips including water safety and road safety to help you prepare for emergencies.
 ■ Preloaded content means you have access to all information at any time, even without a cellular or WiFi connection.
 ■ Interactive quizzes allow you to earn badges that you can share with your friends and share your lifesaving knowledge.
 ■ Improved multi-lingual capability regardless of the user’s location. 
 ■ Linkages to your local Red Cross or Red Crescent on-site and online training.
 ■ Fully integrated with emergency numbers (such as 911, 999, 112, and others) so you can call for help from the app at any time, even while traveling across borders.

Estimate your body temperature, log and track your data, making it easier to spot potential fever symptoms—all without a thermometer!

Knowing your temperature is crucial for maintaining well-being and taking the best care of yourself, so stay proactive about your health by monitoring your body temperature with our app. With just a few simple steps on your mobile device,  you can track your body temperature trends and take proactive steps towards your health goals.


But wait – there's more: 

• Find out, track and log your body temperature with ease.

• Log and easily export your body temperature data and more into PDF to share with your doctor.

• Easily measure wrist temperature with the Apple Watch app and save your data in our app. (requires Apple Watch 8 or newer)

• Use your phone’s camera to estimate your heart rate and then easily log your data afterward.

• Track, log, and export your symptoms and medications effortlessly.

• Monitor the heat index based on location to safeguard yourself against heat-related conditions that could pose health risks.

• Add family members and monitor the body temperature of each.

• Discover how weather conditions can influence your body temperature using our widget.


Whether you're at home or on the go, managing your health has never been easier.

The Body Temperature App for Fever is free to download and utilize. However, users can opt for a subscription to access additional features. Your subscription will automatically renew and you’ll be billed based on the plan you choose. You can cancel your subscription at any time in the App Store.

Disclaimer: For wellness use only. The App is intended to improve your awareness of general wellness. The App can't be used for diagnostics or medical purposes. The App does not diagnose, treat, mitigate or prevent any disease, symptom, disorder or abnormal physical state. Always seek a health care professional or emergency services if you believe you may have a medical issue.

Terms of use: https://aboutmeapps.com/terms-of-use/

Privacy policy: https://aboutmeapps.com/privacy-policy/

Download the world's leading pregnancy tracker app today, for free week-by-week pregnancy information and articles!

The Pregnancy+ app features expert advice, daily articles, healthcare tips and interactive 3D models so you can track your baby's development. Our pregnancy app has been downloaded over 80 million times by expecting families. Join our worldwide community today! 

Baby Development
► Unique, interactive 3D models showing your baby's development 
► Baby Size Guide helps you visualise your baby's size in fruits, animals & sweets
► Pregnancy Week-by-Week Guides explain what to expect in each pregnancy week
► Simple & informative Pregnancy Timeline highlighting important milestones

Pregnancy Guides & Information
► In-depth Pregnancy Guides covering breastfeeding, exercise, food, twins & more 
► Daily Pregnancy Articles, tailored to your pregnancy stage
► 2D & 3D Scans by pregnancy week for you to browse
► Daily Blog Posts with tips, tricks & helpful advice
► Upload photos in My Bump to create a visual pregnancy diary

Pregnancy Tools
► Pregnancy Due Date Calculator helps you work out when your bundle will arrive
► Kick Counter tracks your baby's movements & activity
► Pregnancy Weight Log helps you keep an eye on changes in your weight
► Contraction Timer measures contractions throughout your labour

Organise & Plan
► Pregnancy Calendar enables you to plan & document your prenatal appointments
► Hospital Bag helps you prepare your hospital visit, for Mother, Birth Partner & Baby
► Birth Plan allows you to customise, organise & export your needs & wishes
► To-Do List & Baby Shopping List for ideas of what you need to do & buy
► Search thousands of Baby Names for inspiration & share your favourites

Our EXCLUSIVE 3D Models
Enjoy our unique 3D models showing your pregnancy's week-by-week development, from blastocyst to foetus to baby. Our 3D models truly help you to connect with the baby growing inside you. 
► Choose from multiple ethnicities
► Zoom in or out & rotate to see the baby's intricate detail
► Watch guided pregnancy week-by-week walk-throughs
► Tap to see baby movements

Pregnancy Articles & Guides
If you're feeling overwhelmed by all the advice out there, don't worry. Our Pregnancy + tracker app will guide you through your pregnancy, week-by-week, keeping you up to date with your baby's development and helping you stay healthy through pregnancy and beyond. The Pregnancy+ app content is written in-house, with the help of medical experts, lactation consultants, midwives and, of course, parents.

Share your journey with friends & family
Our pregnancy tracker app can be personalised so your partner, future grandparents or best friend can join in the fun and follow your baby's development in the womb, from bump to birth! Keep everyone up to date with your pregnancy by inviting them to download the app today.

Follow us on Social Media
Facebook: facebook.com/PregnancyPlusApp
Instagram: @pregnancyplus

◆ Download Pregnancy+ App today ◆

Privacy Policy
https://info.philips-digital.com/PrivacyNotice?locale=en&country=GB

Terms of Use
https://info.philips-digital.com/TermsOfUse?locale=en&country=GB

This app is not intended for medical use, or to replace the advice of a trained medical doctor. Philips Consumer Lifestyle B.V. disclaims any liability for the decisions you make based on this information, which is provided to you on a general information basis only and not as a substitute for personalised medical advice. If you have any concerns about your pregnancy, consult with your doctor or midwife.

The Pregnancy + tracker app wishes you a healthy, full-term pregnancy and a safe delivery.

This app helps you monitor your baby's development. It can help you follow the baby's sleep patterns: how long they sleep and whether they are keeping to schedule. Breast feeding: how much and how often your baby eats. Pumping schedule. Diaper changes. Also, you can keep a record of your baby's health: temperature, illnesses, vaccinations and doctor's visits. Add notes on your baby's mood and important events, such as: first words, first laugh, etc. Record changes in weight, length and head size.

Main Tracking Features: 
* Feeding (by breast, bottle or baby food) 
* Diaper changes 
* Sleep, activity and mood changes 
* Breast pump scheduling 
* Extra notes for doctor's visits and vaccinations 
* Add changes to size and weight 
* Add photographs and comment on events 
* Convenient layout and organization for journal and notes

If you have any questions or requests, please write to neumandev@gmail.com. We are eager to hear your comments on how to improve the app.

Discover one of the top pregnancy tracker apps designed specifically for women and expecting parents. This application will keep you calm throughout your pregnancy, providing daily insights into your baby's development and your own health. It will let you know what’s happening with you and your unborn baby—week after week—and offer guidance on how to handle new situations. New, helpful articles are posted every day to support your pregnancy journey!




Keep track of your weight, blood pressure, tummy growth, baby's first movements, and contractions with our advanced tracking tools. Save all your important data in a single, easy-to-share report for your doctor, ensuring your pregnancy progress is well-documented.


May your pregnancy be pleasant and wonderful! Our app provides the tools and resources expecting parents need to feel confident and prepared.



The Most Interesting Features of the App:
- Convenient Calendar: Schedule tests and doctor visits effortlessly.  

- Pregnancy Diary: Use this tracker to log your weight, tummy size, blood pressure, mood, and sexual activity daily. Never miss appointments or key tests.  

- Weekly Baby Development Updates: Find out when your baby becomes the size of a grapefruit, grows eyelashes, or when you can discover their gender. Get nutritional and lifestyle advice tailored for women and their babies.  

- Daily Articles: Access a wealth of resources and tools with professional advice to help women navigate emotions, relationships, and health during pregnancy.  

- Doctor Report: Compile all your tracking data into a comprehensive report, available as a PDF or on your phone, to share with your doctor.  

- Checklists and To-Do Lists: Stay organized with trimester-specific checklists and to-do lists—perfect for expecting parents.  

- Smart Gestational Age Calculator: Trusted by top medical professionals, this tool calculates fetal and obstetric terms with pinpoint accuracy.  

- Kegel Exercises: Prepare for childbirth with guided exercises, an essential tool for women’s health during pregnancy.  

- Contraction Counter: This intelligent tracker distinguishes real contractions from practice ones, ensuring you and your baby are ready for delivery.  

- Health App Synchronization: Securely save your pregnancy tracking data with seamless integration.


We’ve worked hard to create one of the best apps for expectant mothers. Send your feedback to team@wachanga.com (mailto:team@wachanga.com)—we’re here to support women and parents every step of the way.



GOLD STATUS IN THE APP
- The subscription costs $1.99 per month
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
- Private Policy - https://wachanga.com/privacy
- Terms of Use - https://wachanga.com/terms

BabyInside – календарь беременности, приложение для беременных, которое включает в себя все необходимое в этот замечательный для вас период. Настало время, когда вы определили для себя “Буду мамой!”.

Все будущие мамочки, которые хотят отслеживать срок беременности, хоть раз пробовали различные календари беременности. Вас заботит как отследить беременность, календарь по неделям вам поможет. BabyInside создан молодыми родителями для молодых родителей, поэтому мы точно знаем, что происходит с будущей мамой на каждой недели беременности, как развивается жизнь внутри беременной. 

Беременная мама найдет для себя много полезного. Мы собрали необходимые статьи, функции, такие как график веса, упражнение кегеля, чек-лист для молодой мамы, советы для пап в одном удобном приложении. Отслеживать срок беременности с BabyInside очень удобно!

Вы можете быстро определить дата родов по месячным. Для того, чтобы узнать дату родов или какая у вас неделя беременности, вам потребуется только ввести дату первого дня последней менструации. Мы подскажем, какие вещи собрать в роддом, как выбрать роддом, советы по питанию, витамины для беременных, упражнения для будущих мам и многое другое. Если вы думаете, что это приложение создано только для мам - вы сильно ошибаетесь. Календарь беременности по неделям могут использовать, и молодые папы найдут для себя много интересной информации:

- токсикоз, как с ним бороться
- счетчик схваток, когда ехать в роддом
- калькулятор беременности, расчет срока по месячным 
- сколько осталось дней до родов
- беременность по неделям, даты недель для удобного отслеживания
- календарь беременности
- статьи о беременности, питание для будущих мам, фитнес при беременности
- все о родах
- грудное вскармливание
- многоплодная беременности, близнецы, двойня, тройня
- и многое другое

Все эти вопросы освещены в данный момент для вас в нашем приложении для молодых родителей. Будущие мамы – мы готовы сопроводить вас в это прекрасный период вашей жизни, мы поможем вам с ним справиться. Забота о будущих мамах ляжет на нас! А готовы ли вы? Скачивайте наше приложение. Будем признательны за хорошую оценку!

Terms of Use: https://babyinsideapp.ru/terms.html

developer: Modra Jagoda, spletno oblikovanje in razvoj mobilnih aplikacij d.o.o.

description:
Η εφαρμογή FreeStyle LibreLink είναι εγκεκριμένη για χρήση με αισθητήρες του συστήματος FreeStyle Libre και FreeStyle Libre 2. Μπορείτε να ελέγχετε τη γλυκόζη σας σαρώνοντας τον αισθητήρα σας με το τηλέφωνό σας. Τώρα οι χρήστες του αισθητήρα του συστήματος FreeStyle Libre 2 μπορούν να λαμβάνουν αυτόματες ενδείξεις γλυκόζης στην εφαρμογή FreeStyle LibreLink, οι οποίες ενημερώνονται κάθε λεπτό, και επίσης να λαμβάνουν ειδοποιήσεις όταν η γλυκόζη είναι χαμηλή ή υψηλή. [1][2]

Μπορείτε να χρησιμοποιείτε την εφαρμογή FreeStyle LibreLink για:

* Να προβάλλετε την τρέχουσα ένδειξη γλυκόζης, ένα βέλος τάσης που δείχνει την κατεύθυνση μεταβολής της γλυκόζης και το ιστορικό γλυκόζης
* Να λαμβάνετε ειδοποιήσεις χαμηλής ή υψηλής γλυκόζης με αισθητήρες του συστήματος FreeStyle Libre 2 [2]
* Να βλέπετε αναφορές, όπως τον Χρόνο εντός στόχου και τα Ημερήσια μοτίβα
* Να γίνεται κοινοποίηση των δεδομένων σας στον γιατρό σας και την οικογένειά σας με την συγκατάθεσή σας [3]

ΣΥΜΒΑΤΟΤΗΤΑ ΜΕ SMARTPHONE
Η συμβατότητα μπορεί να διαφέρει ανάλογα με το τηλέφωνο και το λειτουργικό σύστημα. Μάθετε περισσότερα σχετικά με τα συμβατά τηλέφωνα στη διεύθυνση http://FreeStyleLibre.com.

ΧΡΗΣΗ ΤΗΣ ΕΦΑΡΜΟΓΗΣ ΣΑΣ ΚΑΙ ΤΗΣ ΣΥΣΚΕΥΗΣ ΑΝΑΓΝΩΣΗΣ ΜΕ ΤΟΝ ΙΔΙΟ ΑΙΣΘΗΤΗΡΑ
Οι ειδοποιήσεις μπορούν να εμφανιστούν μόνο στη συσκευή ανάγνωσης FreeStyle Libre 2 ή στο τηλέφωνό σας (όχι και στα δύο). Για να λαμβάνετε ειδοποιήσεις στο τηλέφωνό σας, πρέπει να εκκινήσετε τον αισθητήρα με την εφαρμογή. Για να λαμβάνετε ειδοποιήσεις στη συσκευή ανάγνωσης FreeStyle Libre 2, πρέπει να εκκινήσετε τον αισθητήρα με τη συσκευή ανάγνωσής σας.  Αφού εκκινηθεί ο αισθητήρας με τη συσκευή ανάγνωσης, μπορείτε επίσης να σαρώσετε τον συγκεκριμένο αισθητήρα με το τηλέφωνό σας.

Να θυμάστε ότι δεν μπορεί να γίνει μεταφορά δεδομένων μεταξύ της εφαρμογής και της συσκευής ανάγνωσης. Για πλήρη λήψη δεδομένων σε μια συσκευή, σαρώνετε τον αισθητήρα σας κάθε 8 ώρες με την ίδια συσκευή, διαφορετικά, οι αναφορές σας δεν θα περιλαμβάνουν όλα τα δεδομένα σας. Μπορείτε να ανεβάζετε και να προβάλλετε δεδομένα από όλες τις συσκευές σας στο LibreView.com.

ΠΛΗΡΟΦΟΡΙΕΣ ΓΙΑ ΤΗΝ ΕΦΑΡΜΟΓΗ
Η εφαρμογή FreeStyle LibreLink χρησιμοποιείται για τη μέτρηση των επιπέδων γλυκόζης σε άτομα με διαβήτη σε συνδυασμό με έναν αισθητήρα. Για περισσότερες πληροφορίες σχετικά με τον τρόπο χρήσης της εφαρμογής FreeStyle LibreLink, ανατρέξτε στο εγχειρίδιο χρήσης, το οποίο μπορείτε να ανοίξετε μέσω της εφαρμογής. Αν θέλετε το εγχειρίδιο χρήσης σε έντυπη μορφή, επικοινωνήστε με το Τμήμα Υποστήριξης Πελατών της Abbott Diabetes Care.

Συμβουλευτείτε έναν επαγγελματία υγείας για να επιβεβαιώσετε εάν αυτό το προϊόν είναι κατάλληλο για εσάς ή εάν έχετε ερωτήσεις σχετικά με τη χρήση αυτού του προϊόντος για να λαμβάνετε θεραπευτικές επιλογές.

Μάθετε περισσότερα στη διεύθυνση http://FreeStyleLibre.com.

[1] Αν χρησιμοποιείτε την εφαρμογή FreeStyle LibreLink, πρέπει να έχετε επίσης πρόσβαση σε ένα σύστημα παρακολούθησης γλυκόζης αίματος, καθώς η εφαρμογή δεν παρέχει τέτοιο σύστημα.  

[2] Οι ειδοποιήσεις που λαμβάνετε δεν περιλαμβάνουν την ένδειξη γλυκόζης σας, επομένως πρέπει να σαρώνετε τον αισθητήρα σας για να ελέγχετε τη γλυκόζη σας.

[3] Για τη χρήση των FreeStyle LibreLink και LibreLinkUp απαιτείται εγγραφή στο LibreView.

The sensor housing, FreeStyle, Libre, and related brand marks are marks of Abbott. Other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

Heart Rate — Your Personal Health Tracker

Your heart health is the foundation of your overall well-being, and staying on top of it is the key to a healthier, more active life. Heart Rate is a simple, intuitive, and powerful app designed to monitor your pulse, analyze health data, and support smarter lifestyle decisions.

Why Heart Rate Matters

Your pulse speaks volumes about your health. By regularly tracking it, you can detect changes early and gain a deeper understanding of your body. Whether you're managing blood pressure, aiming to lose weight, or just staying informed, Heart Rate is the perfect companion.

Features That Work for You
• Daily Pulse Measurement with the Camera. Just place your finger on the camera to get started — no special devices needed.
• Blood Pressure Tracking. Log your readings to monitor trends and spot crucial changes.
• Symptom Journal and Wellness Tracking. Record how you feel to uncover connections between symptoms and activity.
• Detailed Graphs for Any Timeframe. View your data over a day, (month and year available by subscription)  with clear, visual insights.
• Measurement History and Insights. Keep all your records in one place for easy analysis or sharing with your doctor(available by subscription).
• Apple Watch Support. Measure your pulse directly from your wrist.
• Physical Fitness Analysis. See how your endurance and activity levels are improving.
• Heart Rate Zones. Discover when you're burning fat or boosting your cardio performance.
• Apple Health Integration. All your health data synced for seamless access.
• Compare Your Data to Norms. See how your stats stack up against averages for your age and gender.
• Informative Articles and Tips. Learn about the most critical heart health metrics and how to improve them.

The Analysis Tab: Our Crown Jewel

We’re especially proud of this feature. The Analysis tab goes beyond numbers. It gives you a full picture of your heart health, comparing your resting heart rate and endurance with statistical norms for your age and gender. For fitness enthusiasts, it even identifies pulse zones to help you maximize fat burn or enhance cardio performance. Everything is straightforward, actionable, and built to make your health journey smoother.

Important Disclaimer

The Heart Rate app is for informational purposes only and is not intended for medical use. Always consult a doctor for diagnosis and treatment.

Heart Rate is your ultimate tool for health tracking, making it easier than ever to stay informed, proactive, and in control. Start prioritizing your heart today!

Get help with managing your diabetes, it's quick and easy!

Ranked the Top Diabetes App by Healthline 3 times. Featured in Forbes, TechCrunch, and The Washington Post.

Adding the mySugr Diabetes App to your daily routine with diabetes (Type 1, Type 2, or Gestational diabetes) will make your life easier. 

The mySugr diabetes app is your loyal and free diabetes logbook, which keeps your diabetes data under control. With one app you'll have:

• Easy and personalised dashboard (diet, meds, carb intake, blood glucose levels and more).
• Insulin/Bolus calculator with precise insulin dose recommendations (Limited to some countries using mySugr PRO).
• See clear blood sugar level graphs.
• Estimated HbA1c at a glance, no more surprises.
• Daily, weekly, and monthly reports, that you can share directly with your doctor.
• Secure data backup (built with regulatory compliance, quality, and safety).

Make diabetes suck less.

1. APP FEATURES
It auto-logs your data plus you can collect your daily therapy info such as meals, your diet and carb intakes. Also, medications you take, blood glucose levels and insulin levels.

2. INTEGRATIONS
• Steps, activity, blood pressure, CGM data, weight, and more.
Accu-Chek® Mobile (with the support of wireless adapter) (activate mySugr PRO for no charge! Please see our FAQ on the website for the latest information).

3. PRO FEATURES
Take your diabetes therapy to the next level! mySugr PRO can be activated at no charge with some Accu-Chek® devices or with a monthly or yearly paid subscription.
• Smart search: build your own searchable database of places, meals, activity, tags, etc.
• Insulin Calculator (check available countries): calculate your insulin dose, corrections, and meal shots.
• PDF & Excel reports: save or print all your data for you or your doctor.
• Blood glucose reminders: you won't forget to check and log.
• Meal photos: snap your meals to improve your carb counting.
• Basal rates: for pump users.

Get it now! A clear logbook to monitor, control and manage your diabetes: all your medical information right on your smartphone and ready to be used! Stay on top of your health, monitor your carbs, manage your medicine intake with Bolus Calculator (mySugr PRO), get help avoiding hypers/hypos, and be in control of your diabetes therapy every day!

"Anatomy 3D Atlas" allows you to study human anatomy in an easy and interactive way. 
Through a simple and intuitive interface it is possible to observe every anatomical structure from any angle.
The anatomical 3D models are particularly detailed and with textures up to 4k resolution.

The subdivision by regions and the predefined views facilitate the observation and the study of single parts or groups of systems and the relationships between different organs.

"Anatomy - 3D Atlas" is an application aimed at medical students, doctors, physiotherapists, paramedics, nurses, athletic trainers and in anyone interested in deepening their knowledge of human anatomy.
This app is a fantastic tool to complement classic human anatomy books.

ANATOMICAL 3D MODELS
• Musculoskeletal system
• Cardiovascular system
• Nervous system
• Respiratory System
• Digestive System
• Urogenital system (male and female)
• Endocrine system
• Lymphatic system
• Eye and ear system

FEATURES
• Simple and intuitive interface
• Rotate and zoom each model in 3D space
• Option to hide or isolate single or multiple selected models
• Filter to hide or display each system
• Search function to easily find every anatomical part
• Bookmark function to save custom views
• Smart rotation which moves the center of rotation automatically
• Transparency function
• Visualization of muscles through levels of layers from the superficial ones down to the deepest ones
• By selecting a model or a pin, the related anatomical term shows up
• Description of the muscles: origin, insertion, innervation and action
• Show/Hide UI interface (very useful with small screens)

MULTILINGUAL
• The anatomical terms and the user interface are available in 12 languages: Latin, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean and Turkish
• The anatomical terms can be displayed in two languages simultaneously

This App is a handy and reliable assistant for tracking your newborn baby’s daily activities. You can track breastfeeding, bottle feeding, solid food feeding and milk pumping. You can save diaper changes, sleeping periods and the results of your baby's height and weight measurements.

With this baby care app, you get all of these incredible features:
- Track feeding by one breast or by both, if you give your baby two breasts at one feeding
- Track bottle feeding 
- Fix solid food feeding - food and its amount
- If you need to express your milk, you can fix how many ml/oz of each breast were pumped 
- Fix diaper changing, you can note whether it is wet or dirty, or both :slightly_smiling_face:
- Always know how many diapers were changed per day
- Record baths, temperatures, walks, and medications
- Handy breastfeeding timer and sleeping timer are easy to stop and to restart
- Your baby's height and weight can be measured almost daily! They are also easily stored in the baby diary. 
- Add a reminder for each event - periodic and easy-to-set
- Log and track the activity of several babies. Supports twins!

Being a FTM (first-time-mom), or mom in general, is very tiring and challenging! You’ve just made it home from the hospital, exhausted and overwhelmed by your new responsibilities, and need a little help. Don’t worry! In the first few months of your baby's life, it really revolves around eating, sleeping, diaper changes and occasional little doctor's visits. As a new mom, it’s not always easy to remember the last time you fed your baby or changed their diaper. We don’t blame you for falling asleep on the couch occasionally, so we’ve got you covered with handy alarms and reminders. Alarms and graphs are a great way to have an at-a-glance look at what you need to do without stressing over "what if I forget?”.

Our app will help you keep track of feedings, your baby’s weight and how long they were eating to make sure they’re gaining weight properly and at a normal rate. Unfortunately for some parents, it’s imperative that they track every last drop of food their baby eats since some infants are born with illnesses that make it harder to gain weight normally. Keeping track of diapers is also imperative to keeping your baby healthy. Everyone needs an easy way to check how often they’re changing diapers, and if everything looks normal during each change.

Just click the appropriate button at the beginning of the feeding and other activities. Your baby care history will be reliably stored. All this information may be useful when you visit the pediatrician, as well as for the further development of your child.

Check your baby’s day to day activities easily and efficiently. This baby care app will help you keep track of everything in one convenient place and help moms take care of themselves by having a peace of mind.

Email us your comments and suggestions, and we'll implement them as soon as possible!

GOLD STATUS IN THE APP

developer: CLOUD COMPUTING TECHNOLOGY SP Z O O
description:
Discover a helpful tool for skin self-monitoring, designed to support awareness and early attention to skin changes. Try it and start checking your skin today.

With just a quick scan, the app helps users recognize visual patterns that may be associated with common skin conditions, such as moles, rashes, or irritations. You'll receive general information based on visual similarities with reference images and can save your scans to track skin changes over time.

AI Skin Scanner is intended to support early skin awareness and encourage users to seek timely medical advice when needed.

No appointments, no waiting — take a convenient first step in monitoring your skin right from your phone.

Disclaimer:
AI Skin Scanner is a pre-diagnostic self-assessment tool that aims to raise awareness about the visual appearance of skin changes. It is not a medical device for diagnosis or treatment, and it does not replace professional medical evaluation.

Always consult a qualified dermatologist or healthcare provider to interpret any findings, receive a diagnosis, or begin treatment. Using this app is not a substitute for professional care. For any suspicious lesions, unusual changes, or concerns, early consultation with a healthcare professional is essential.

Bausch + Lomb FitBetter™ offers a suite of tools and resources to support eyecare practitioners fitting contact lenses in practice. 

•	 Lens Recommendation Tool - Find the best lens for your patient. Whether you're looking for spherical, toric or multifocal lenses, simply enter the patient's prescription and the back vertex distance, and we'll do the rest.*
•	 Visual Acuity Conversion Tool - Need to convert Snellen to metric, or decimal to LogMAR? Use this handy tool to record accurate visual acuity measurements no matter what scale your chart uses.
•	 Bausch + Lomb Fitting Guides - View and download a full range of fitting guides for Bausch + Lomb Contact Lenses.
•	 Bausch + Lomb Product Information – Find out everything you need to know about our range of Bausch + Lomb Contact Lenses.

*The Bausch + Lomb FitBetter™ App is designed to support eyecare practitioners and is not intended to be used for any diagnosis or treatment recommendation or a substitute for clinical judgement or opinion of a qualified ECP. The Bausch + Lomb FitBetter™ App is not classified as medical device.
